title: Ep 455 | Miss Kay Teases Phil That She May Still Be a Baptist Girl & Jase Questions His Old Job
description:
Jase and Phil are joined again by guest Gordon Dasher to discuss Paul's letters to the church of Corinth. Jase describes the most credible witness taking the stand to testify on your behalf, and Gordon points out the humor and sarcasm in some of Paul's letters. Phil tells a funny story about Miss Kay and her misplaced letter of membership, and Gordon identifies the difference between following the law and obeying God through your heart. Al shares where true confidence really comes from, and Jase describes the time God gave him a platform that he didn't feel qualified to take.

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV:  https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
